channel.title: Comments on: How to return error messages from the SQL Server to the client using SQLDataSource
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Eralper
item.dc:creator: Eralper
item.description: Hello Naomi,<br /> Another great post of you. It is nice to gather the solution together for other ASP.NET developers to benefit from this article.
item.content:encoded:
Hello Naomi,
Another great post of you. It is nice to gather the solution together for other ASP.NET developers to benefit from this article.

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: At least you return an error, I can't tell you how many times I have see code back in the day where the first thing was On Error Resume Next
item.content:encoded: At least you return an error, I can’t tell you how many times I have see code back in the day where the first thing was On Error Resume Next
